metadata.title: CVE-2018-19219 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In LibSass 3.5-stable, there is an illegal address access atSass::Eval::operator that will lead to a DoS attack.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
